casebody.data:
No. 389,

Misc.

Hodges v. United States. Henry B. Weaver, Jr., Quinn O’Connell and Hershel Shanks for petitioner. Solicitor General Rankin, Assistant Attorney General Wilkey and Beatrice Rosenberg for the United States.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted. Case transferred to the appellate docket.
